quiz.text: Which among the following organizations had recently released “Turning of the tap” report?

Greenpeace

quiz.text: According to the recently released “Turning of the tap” report, globally plastic waste generated every year is_______.

500 million tonnes
100 million tonnes
800 million tonnes
550 million tonnes

quiz.text: The “Turning of the tap” report recommends governments and businesses alike to adopt a circular economy approach for tackling the problem of plastic pollution. A shift to circular economy would save_______.
options: $ 2.00 trillion
$ 1.27 trillion
$ 2.27 trillion
$ 3.05 trillion
$ 2.50 trillion
